required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mallampati Score Before and After Cesarean Delivery

brief_summary.textblock:
Mallampati class change has not been well evaluated during the cesarean delivery. Various factors regarding to cesarean delivery might influence this changes. The aim of this study was to evaluate the Mallampati class before and after cesarean delivery and to identify predictive factors of the changes..
Study Type: Observational Cross-sectional study

detailed_description.textblock: Mallampati class, thyromental distance, neck circumference, and upper lip bite test were evaluated at four time intervals : during pre-anesthetic visit (T0), 1-hour (T1), 6-hour (T2), and 24-hour after delivery (T3).

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate Modified Mallampati score changes before and after cesarean delivery
primary_outcome.description: Modified Mallampati score (score 1-4;1= easy airway and 4 = difficult airway) before delivery, 2 and 6 hours after delivery, and post-operative day1 (the day of surgery and post-operative day 1)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate thyromental distance changes before and after cesarean delivery
primary_outcome.description: thyromental distance (centimeter) before delivery, 2 and 6 hours after delivery, and post-operative day1 (the day of surgery and post-operative day 1)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate upper lip bite score changes before and after cesarean delivery
primary_outcome.description: Upper lip bite score (score 1-4; 1 = easy airway and 4 = difficult airway) before delivery, 2 and 6 hours after delivery, and post-operative day1 (the day of surgery and post-operative day 1)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate neck circumference changes before and after cesarean delivery
primary_outcome.description: Neck circumference (centimeter) before delivery, 2 and 6 hours after delivery, and post-operative day1 (the day of surgery and post-operative day 1)

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxytocin dosage and Alteration of Modified mallampati score
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the percentage of patients whose mallampati score increase from baseline between patient who recieved high dose oxytocin (≥ 0.6 U/minl) and low dose oxytocin ( <0.6 U/min )

secondary_outcome.measure: Intraoperative intravenous fluid and Alteration of Modified mallampati score
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the percentage of patients whose mallampati score increase from baseline between patient who recieved intravenous fluid ≥ 2000 ml and < 2000 ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Estimate blood loss and Alteration of Modified mallampati score
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the percentage of patients whose mallampati score increase from baseline between patient whose estimate blood loss≥ 1000 ml and < 1000 ml

intervention.description: Evaluate upper airway changes at several point of time before and after cesarean delivery

study_pop.textblock: Thai pregnant women scheduled for cesarean section, age ≥ 18 y at gestational age ≥ 37 weeks giving written informed consent.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women scheduled for cesarean section, age ≥ 18 y at gestational age ≥ 37 weeks giving written informed consent.
- Initial Mallampati score ≤ III
- Normal clinical course
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient who denied to participate the study
- Initial Mallampati score ≥ IV
- Age < 18 years old
